net.sf.tweety.agents

Interface Environment


  • public interface Environment
    This interface models an environment for agents, i.e. an entity that reacts on actions with percepts.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Perceivable> execute(Collection<? extends Executable> actions)
      Executes the given actions simultaneously and returns the resulting percepts.
      Set<Perceivable> execute(Executable action)
      Executes the given action and returns the resulting percepts.
      Set<Perceivable> getPercepts(Agent agent)
      Retrieves the current percepts for the given agent.
      boolean reset()
      Resets the environment, i.e. brings it to its initialization state.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        Set<Perceivable> execute(Executable action)
        Executes the given action and returns the resulting percepts.
        Parameters:
        action - an executable
        Returns:
        a set of percepts.

      • execute

        Set<Perceivable> execute(Collection<? extends Executable> actions)
        Executes the given actions simultaneously and returns the resulting percepts.
        Parameters:
        actions - a collection of executables.
        Returns:
        a set of percepts.

      • getPercepts

        Set<Perceivable> getPercepts(Agent agent)
        Retrieves the current percepts for the given agent.
        Parameters:
        agent - an agent.
        Returns:
        a set of percepts perceivable for the given agent.

      • reset

        boolean reset()
        Resets the environment, i.e. brings it to its initialization state.
        Returns:
        "true" iff reset was successful.
